title: Operation Schema
description: This object contains information about the operation representation in MQTT.

qos.description: Defines the Quality of Service (QoS) levels for the message flow between client and server. Its value MUST be either 0 (At most once delivery), 1 (At least once delivery), or 2 (Exactly once delivery).

retain.description: Whether the broker should retain the message or not.

messageExpiryInterval.description: Lifetime of the message in seconds

bindingVersion.description: The version of this binding. If omitted, 'latest' MUST be assumed.
